A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie confused me. Maybe that was Johnson's intention--to throw your Star Wars expectations out the window. It takes some very surprising turns. As a huge fan of the originals\, these turns are a little difficult to stomach. I do think Star Wars needed a fresh direction and this certainly does that\, but so many of the turns are too jarring\, not paced well\, poorly written and thought out. This felt more like a Disney movie in Star Wars clothing. I liked parts of this movie but just as soon as it drew me in\, it kicked me out.
